com.nsqre.insquare.Activities

Class ChatActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
          • com.nsqre.insquare.Activities.ChatActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, MessageAdapter.ChatMessageClickListener

    public class ChatActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements MessageAdapter.ChatMessageClickListener, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener
    This activity lets the user chat in a Square, using a socket.io chat
